评论概述: Not bad I'd say it's still a nice buy
评论详情: Only complaint is for what it is priced way to high at 60 bucks but it's cute I'll probably buy another when it's on sale. Fits well thick material it 9 degrees outside still got cold. 评论概述: Shocked by the quality of this set
评论详情: I abuse my sweatpants. My Brandy ones are falling apart after only three years. Bought this set to replace them. I couldn't believe how high-quality and thick the material is. I've been wearing each piece of this set almost every day since the purchase. If you're looking for a summer set, this is not it. It's very warm and cozy. The color match is also perfect. Quick note - the hood on the hoodie is huge and does not have a drawstring; it holds its shape very well, and keeps my head nice and warm, but not what I was expecting. The pants have a string on the interior of the waistband. Love love love this set, and I might just buy another if my other pants keep wearing out.
very large for small
I sized down for a little tighter fit, it’s still a little loose & super comfy. Love it.
Love this sweat outfit! So comfy. Would def buy again .

Looks cute on and it’s super cozy. I’m typically a medium and that’s what I ordered and it fit well. However, the hoodie  doesn’t move with you. If I raise my arms, the waist band stays up. It needs constant readjusting and this is something I find really annoying especially if I’m running errands or doing very mild activities.  It’s the second time I ordered so I just kept it. I returned the first order because although I followed laundry instructions the top shrank enough to be unwearable. Dont be tempted, just air dry! If it weren’t for the issue with readjusting, I would have purchased more colors. But I think there are better sets out there.
So warm and cozy with ultimate comfort. Excellent quality!
No no this is not it at all. Material is horrible,  thick and not soft at all . Horrible color. Pass on this also runs extremely small

评论概述: A fav sweat set, just slightly annoying to wash
评论详情: A super comfy and cute sweat set. I’d almost say it’s as good as a comfrt sweat set🫢 Follow wash instructions, it says to line dry. I’m too scared to try it in the dryer so always wash cold and line dry, just a heads up. Only giving it a 4 because of washing and having to hang dry.
Runs really large for the size, not great material
Liked this sweatshirt very much comfortable and fits well...
i think the bottoms were a little big as a 5’1 but it doesn’t look bad at all, i rolled it once so the butt wasn’t saggy. Love them good quality, almost like it should’ve been more expensive.
My comfiest set. I want it in all the colors!
Super soft and comfortable
such a comfy set! wear it all the time
Didn’t fit right. But cute color. Really thick material that made me hot while wearing.

EXCELLENT MATERIAL AND QUALITY, BUT Only giving it 4 stars because an XL was REALLY BAGGY and big through the shoulders.  Yes, it said baggy in the description, but I didn't think it was going to be huge.  I am going to try to size down to a Large and hopefully I feel better in it.  Great Quality but it really ran big.
I got a large but should’ve gotten a medium!

Set is super comfortable and thick. Very comfy and perfect length for someone who is tall like me. Definitely will be buying more colors. Only downfall for me is the collar part is a little snug for my liking. Otherwise this set is perfect!!

The ONLY reason I gave this 4 stars is because there were small holes in the lining of both pockets of the pants. I don’t normally put stuff in my pockets so not a huge deal but a little annoying none the less. Otherwise this suit is fabulous. Super soft, true to size and the color is just as pictured. I do plan to purchase again, and I’ll keep my fingers crossed there are no holes in the pockets.

评论概述: Darkgrey color looks very high quality!
评论详情: I’m 5’11, 150 pounds and this fit perfectly! This color specifically looks the best quality out of all of the reviews I saw. 10/10 would recommend.
I love  the quality and durability of these! The comfort level is awesome as well!
Shrunk in wash, wish I could return :/
Love this!! Need it in every color
Comfy, but I ordered two sets in the same color but different sizes and the colors weren’t the same… wouldn’t have been a problem but I was mixing the sets as I needed small pants and a medium top

Love at first wearing. These sweat outfits are so cozy. The color was pretty similar to the picture (light pink). The material is soft and the elastic at the waist and ankles is not so tight that it binds. I normally purchase a size large in sweats but I purchased an XL and glad I did because I wanted the oversized look. I washed and dried them before wearing and they came out of the dryer perfectly. I highly recommend these and as a side note I was gifted a pair of sweats that are all the rage right now and I prefer these over them.
Good quality the hoodie doesn’t have much of a stretch so if you got big boobs lol size up on the hoodie but I’m 5’1 185 I got the large

I’m 5’3” 142 lbs and the small fits perfectly!

Great sweat set, I was hesitant to buy as sometimes the material for sweat sets feels cheap but this brand is amazing! On the thicker side so it will keep you nice and warm. The pink is so cute and girly!! 10/10 recommend!
This fits very well.  Comfortable!  Love the color!  Cozy, great for January weather!

评论概述: Disappointed by heavy fading and rips after 1 wash
评论详情: When I initially got this sweat set I was in love. I wanted one in several other colors. However, after 1 wash the color faded tremendously which was disappointing because the black was so crisp initially. Okay whatever, maybe it’s my washer. BUT while doing absolutely nothing on my couch the pants rip! I mean literally laying on the couch and my cousin points out how they have ripped up the butt. I bought the outfit about 1 size too big because I wanted it baggy for lounging…and it ripped! GHETTO. It is comfortable and very warm though.

I never write reviews but I rely on them so I felt obligated. I've tried so many amazon sets and this one is the BEST I've tried. I'm 5'5 and 115 lbs and I ordered a small. They are oversized but still flattering and cute. I think an xs would have been great as well. Also, very warm and comfortable.
True to size, super comfortable, and very cute!

评论用户: Great case! Does exactly what I need it to do.

this set is amazing!! it feels exactly like my aritzia one. i will say this does run true to size, so i sized up to get a more oversized feel but overall i highly recommend

评论概述: Sizing is off a medium is really a Womens xl a men’s large
评论详情: Sizing is off a medium is really a Womens xl a men’s large

I am 5’8” and 140lbs. My shoulders are more on the wider side and I have long legs. I ordered a medium and it fits PERFECTLY. I haven’t washed it yet but based on other reviews, I’m not too worried about it shrinking. The quality feels great! It’s thick, super soft and the color matches the photos. I have the waist band tied up high on the smallest part of my waist and the length is still great! I recommended it to a friend and she will also be buying a set! I am extremely picky about how my clothes fit and the aesthetic they give off, these are exactly what I was wanting. I love this set!

I had to send back and buy a size up, I ordered the large but the pants were a bit snug around my waist so I got the X-Large. I absolutely love the fabric it’s warm and very cute. I just ordered another one in dark blue. I am 5’3 and 194 pounds if that helps for size. Definitely recommend getting these, they’re perfect for winter.

Love the outfit and the way it feels ..cozy with a little weight will definitely purchase more. Deep pockets in the sweats.  Only thing is this color is 1 inch shorter than the cream one.  Hope it doesn't shrink.
I spent $50 on an outfit that is non name brand which fits great and looks good and so comfy..  why spend $200 for name brand??? the fit is awesome
good quality

评论概述: BEST Cozy Warm Sweatsuit I own!!!
评论详情: LOVE LOVE LOVE this.  I would wear it everyday!  1st time wash does not leave your washer full of fuzzies.  Sweatshirts, sweat pants I've bought before need multiple washes before i can wear due to shedding/fuzzies. Not this set.  I work from home and this is perfect.  Definately will be buying in more colors.  I wear med to small.  5'9 & 140lbs.  I orginally bought the Med cause I like the bigger fit.  I returned (it was huge) and got the S.  Fits perfect.  I have long legs and these are not short on me.  A nice surprise!

I purchased this sweatsuit and I love it! It’s so comfortable, it’s so cozy! The color is nice, this is a great value for money, the weight of this sweat suit is perfect it feels solid. I wouldn’t say that this is not stretchy because I purchased a medium. For the my height of 5”7 this is the perfect fit and the hoodie is the perfect oversized look! I loved it so much that I went and purchased the grey set and I a wearing it today and absolutely love it!

These are the softest sweats I own. I am 5'11 and wear a size large. They are true to size. The weight is a perfect combo of comfort and warmth. The length in the sleeves, pants and torso are generous. They hold up great in the wash. I do not dry them and they do not fade or pill at all. While they are more spendy then other sweat suits they are worth every penny. Accurate description and great quality while being very stylish and flattering.
I was expecting the pink on the photo rather I received this bright ugly pink
I think it fits perfect and I love the quality of it and it's very warm I did read some negative reviews so I was nervous but I love it
This suit is the softest sweatsuit I have ever bought. Nice gluey thick material, great for cold days. The fit is  true to size. Love it. I had to buy myself another suit because it fits so good.
Fit is absolutely amazing. Pants are made so well. Fitted in right spots! Baggy in right spots. Need every color.
I wear it all the time and receive many compliments. Very comfy and fits perfect to size
I ordered several in different colors and they are so warm and comfortable.  I highly recommend these with the cold temperatures we are having. Worth the price.
I wanted to love this and was excited for a comfy 2 piece sweat suit.  It is super comfortable but after one wash already started to get pilly and fade in color.

I love this sweatset! I have two (dark green and gray), and I feel it's the best cheap sweatset you'll find on amazon. Quality does not compare to nicer brands (Aritzia, Lululemon, etc) but it gives the look I'm going for, and it is thick (enough) and soft. I ordered a medium for an oversized feel, and it did shrink slightly with the first wash. Pants just got slightly shorter. Overall, 10/10 recommend

评论概述: Great sweatsuit but came with weird stain all over hoodie
评论详情: So comfortable but came with a weird whitish stain all over the hoodie. Haven’t washed it yet since I just got it today. It is very faint, just odd that it came this way. I ordered a pink one last week and it came in great condition. I am hoping washing it will remove the stains but kind of disappointed.

This product is very warm & has great quality and feel to it. Sizing was accurate as well as color. I wore this outfit for the first time while I was traveling and it was a very comfortable outfit for travel ability and had plenty of stretch ones. Color was as pictured & I received many compliments about the style.
I bought this in a size M , returned it because it was too big and they re charged me because they never recieved it according to them such a scam !!

评论概述: Superior quality; runs about 1 size larger
评论详情: This is a legit sweatsuit: the quality is like the old school Russell brand hoodies, the dark green color is the exact color as the photo depicts, washes & dries very well. Keeps me very, very warm during the insanely windy & cold winters in the desert.  Be advised this sweatsuit is an oversized style. I am typically between a size small & medium, and the dark green in a size medium is a little big too oversized for the look I wanted. I would say the sweatpants are a bit more oversized than the top (not by very much & the difference isn’t noticeable appearance-wise). When I wear this sweatsuit I’m definitely warm & comfy, and it looks like I borrowed this from my boyfriend which is totally cool with me.  Yes, the pricing is a bit steep, however it’s a sweatsuit that lasts and absolutely does what it’s supposed to. My roommate ordered a dark green sweatsuit from a competitor on Amazon that was half the price, however upon arrival she was super disappointed- the competitor sweatsuits are shiny & too polyester-looking with terrible quality elastic.  This is a great buy. I highly recommend it.
Perfect
Too big, heavy and bulky. Absolutely nothing softer cuddly about this outfit would not recommend to anyone! Also the pants are so long they came up to my neck.

I ordered my regular size and it fits perfectly a little oversized like I wanted. If you want a true oversized fit I would order a size up. I definitely want it in another color! It’s super cute and the inside fleece is very soft. I’ve washed it a couple times now and I haven’t noticed any shrinking. The waistband is comfy and doesn’t dig in at all.  Love it! Great price for a matching set that’s comfy too.
I love the material of these and it keeps me so warm, but the set is too big! I’m 5’3 115 pounds and I ordered an XS and the pants are sooo big on me.
Nice thick material
This material is nice and thick. Super soft on the inside. Color is exactly like the picture
Perfect and will buy more!!
The sweatsuit is warm.  Very think material.  A pretty color.  My daughter is happy with them.
My new favorite loungewear.
love this set. it’s good quality and super think. great for cold weather

I just received these sweats.  I tried them on and first thing I noticed was how comfy and warm they are.  I ordered the green color and it was exactly what I wanted. The fit (medium) is perfect for me.  I am thinking about buying them in another color.  I love these sweats

I really wanted to love this set but there’s just too much wrong with it and I haven’t even washed it yet, so I can’t speak on how it holds up in regards to that but reading the reviews I don’t have high hopes. The most frustrating thing is about the sweatshirt, the hood is SO heavy that it constantly pulls the sweatshirt back and the neckline is being pulled against my neck. It makes it SO uncomfortable and claustrophobic. The neck hole is rather large, which I prefer, but having to pull the sweatshirt down in front every three seconds just so I wasn’t feeling like I was being choked was irritating. The pants are okay, but they’re disproportionate to the top. The sweatshirt fits as expected, an oversized medium fit. The pants that come with it, also a size medium, look and fit like an XL. They’re way too baggy and shapeless and much larger than the size of the sweatshirt they’re supposed to coordinate with. The drawstring is also on the inside and it’s SO long. Seriously, it almost goes down to my knees if it isn’t tied, and when it is tied because there’s so much length it’s uncomfortable sitting on the inside of the waistband. Save your money, look elsewhere. Wish I could return but I had to take the actual fabric tags off to even wear because they were incredibly scratchy.
Got this on sale as a gift for my bestie .  Great solid quality  Warm and medium was true to size for a tall girl  .
Love these for lounging around the house. Super comfy.

I’m 5’4” / 130lbs. Size small.  The material is very soft and durable. It’s oversized so remember that when ordering depending on how you want it to fit.  I bought it for my 15 hour flight to Australia.  It will work great!! Love it!!!

评论概述: Thick, great quality, well worth the money
评论详情: Purchased as a gift for my sister!

This set is clearly advertised as being one product, but with different colors available. I first purchased the light blue in medium. After the first wash in cold water and dried on low heat, it shrunk. I then ordered the light green one in large, considering the fact that they shrunk. The light green fit perfectly after the same first wash, and still does. I ordered the pink one in large, considering my good experience with the large green, and expecting the same fit. The pink one showed up and the waistband at the bottom of the hoodie was completely outstretched and not fitted tightly like all hoodies, it was not the same product as the green one. It doesn’t seem like they are all made the same. & Considering they are charging $60+ for these, I really expected a more consistent product. I bought these because I didn’t want to spend so much money on the Comfrt brand, but after this, I’m about to.
Too bulky and thick for my liking.

I asked my daughter for a sweat suit for Christmas. She gave me the Amazon gift card. After reading a lot of reviews, I picked this one. I got black, size Medium. It’s perfect for me - 5’4 - 145#. Not too big and I think it looks good enough to wear outside on errands or even traveling. Picked black so it wouldn’t look like pajamas. Fabric is very soft & warm. Great for these cold winter days & nights. Would recommend.

评论概述: Weird fit, huge thick weighed down hood
评论详情: The material is nice... but the pants make me feel like Aladdin. I love oversized sweats, but these pants puff out a lot at the bottom around the calves and ankles. The hood is HUGE, and the thickest material I've ever seen on a hood. It's double/triple lined and is even thicker than the sweatshirt material. It literally weighs the sweatshirt down towards the back, and it pokes out from behind and there's no way to flatten it lol. For sizing reference i got a medium, I'm 5'6 and 137 pounds, with long legs so most pants are short on me. The pant length of these are fine, almost too short.. but the issue is the shape/way they're designed at the bottom

I absolutely LOVE this sweat set!!  I’m a size 6-8 and purchased a Medium in the tan color.  Washed/dryed it right away and it’s so soft and cozy!  I’m very impressed with the quality of this set as well.  The material is the perfect thickness, the pant pockets are lined, drawstring in pants is sturdy and the fleecy lining in the top and bottom is so soft.  It also comes in a ton of colors so I will definitely be buying a few more of these sets.  Highly recommend!!

I have ordered 6 sets of these sweatsuits to date upon a recommendation from a sister who has 5 sets. I ordered these for my two teen girls and I. I am 5’ 10” and 150lbs with long arms and legs. My girls are similar in size. I have bought several size Large and they do work, but I would like a little extra length in the arms and legs for personal preference. I decided to order an Xl In the dark green. It arrived and I did like the fit on me a bit more due to a tad extra length in legs and arms. Disappointingly, there appeared to be some crusty food type stains on the hood. I tried using water and a clean washcloth to wipe off, but once the crusties came off it had a grease stain. The box and packing was not damaged, so I am assuming it was from the factory. Amazon was easy to reorder a replacement. Although not a HUGE deal, it’s disappointing to pay $63 to get a crusty stained item and have to go to the hassle of driving 30 Minutes to my closest UPS store to return. 🫤
Exactly was I was looking for. The material is good and the color is so pretty. I really recommend it. It is oversized style
Love this set. Its thick and cozy and does not look cheap at all. Definitely a good deal.
This is a very thick and nicely made sweatsuit.  The price and sizing g are great

评论概述: The Waist Is Small In Comparison To...
评论详情: I'm an athletic and slender build with a waist smaller than my hips and the pants while being baggy have a heavy and strong waistband that is really tight in comparison. I can't wear the pants because they cause discomfort. The hood on the sweatshirt is heavy and I find myself having to readjust and pull the hood forward so that the neckline doesn't choke me. Other than that, the mauve color is great and the material is thick and warm.

评论概述: After 2 months still in excellent condition, great quality!
评论详情: I'm 5'4 and 126lbs and got the small. I live in this jogger set! warm, stylish, and perfectly achieves the "oversized but not sloppy" look. I've washed it multiple times in warm water (I always dry it on low) and it's held up perfectly. I was looking at other colors to buy and decided to write this review lol

I bought the set initially for myself and my daughter really liked it, so I bought a set for her. We both noticed how super warm the set really is and it is good quality. We are getting compliments on the set too! Worth the price and no buyers remorse here!
I love this set. It is so think and soft. However, it bunches up at my ankles in a weird way that makes me think it could be for taller people.
I love this it’s thick enough and so comfortable but if you have longer legs the sweatpants might be a bit short but still wearable
So Comfy! Love it!
This sweat outfit is amazing. The quality is great and I love the dusty pink color. Get it!!! I sized up to a medium I’m 5’3 115lbs and it’s definitely oversized but sooooooo cozy. I love it

I love how these are thick and warm. They are thick but not heavy if that makes sense. They are slimming which is odd for a sweat suit but I feel super cute and cozy in them. They are so soft and they didn't shrink in the wash! I'm going to get more of all the colors they have!
Love this outfit it’s warm thick and comfy also true to size

评论详情: I ordered an XS. I am 5’3 and 104. It is big but I love the fit.  it’s very comfortable. The material is thick. I’m considering getting one more color

评论概述: These are so comfy and warm
评论详情: This hoodie set is honestly exactly what I wanted. I was looking for something roomy, warm and cozy. I wore these out today as it was the first day it’s been cold since I ordered them. I got so many compliments. I purchased both the blue and pink sets. But I plan to order more of this set in the other colors.
Light grey set is very tight on me, black set
Love this set! Bought In 3 colors, I bought a medium

I travel a lot and often fly to see family across the US. Sweats are always tough to pack, so I wanted to get an inexpensive set of sweats to stay at their house to wear while lounging around the house. I always buy a few sizes bigger (I'm always a small and ordered a large in these) and I'd say the sizing is accurate. That said, the quality isn't great. The material is thinner than the photo makes them appear and the length of the pants is a bit awkward. I ended up keeping them because they do the job, but they're definitely not stylish when worn so keep that in mind if you're looking for that "cute" set.
